00274 #define ACQ200_ON_OPEN(inode, file)\
00275         do { \
00276                 if ((PD(file)=acq200_makePathDescriptor(inode->i_rdev)) == 0)\
00277                         return -ENODEV;\
00278                 else \
00279                          DG(file)->bridge_dev.open_count++; \
00280          } while(0)
00281 
00282 #define ACQ200_ON_CLOSE(file) \
00283         do { \
00284                 if (PD(file) != 0){ \
00285                          acq200_freePathDescriptor(PD(file));\
00286                          DG(file)->bridge_dev.open_count--;\
00287                          PD(file) = 0;\
00288                 } \
00289                 return 0; \
00290          } while(0)
00291 
00292 #define MBOX_OFFSET 0x10
00293 #define MBOX_OFFSETL (MBOX_OFFSET/sizeof(u32))
00294 
00295 
00296 #define MBOX(device, ibox) (device->csr.va[MBOX_OFFSETL+(ibox)])
00297 
00298 #define MBOX_WRITE(device, ibox, value)         \
00299         iowrite32((value), &MBOX(device, ibox))
00300 #define MBOX_READ(device, ibox) ioread32(&MBOX(device, ibox))

00304 #define DEV(file)            (PD(file)->device)

00309 static inline int dma_buf_len(struct DmaBuf *dma_buf) 
00310 {
00311         if (dma_buf->va != 0) {
00312                 return (1 << dma_buf->order) * PAGE_SIZE;
00313         } else {
00314                 return 0;
00315         }
00316 }

00463 static inline void copyDmaBuf2IoMapping(
00464         struct IoMapping *mapping, struct DmaBuf *dma_buf)
00465 {
00466         mapping->va = dma_buf->va;
00467         mapping->pa = dma_buf->pa;
00468         mapping->len = dma_buf_len(dma_buf);
00469 }
